tasks.task_description: Fix AuthGuard to wait for Zustand hydration before checking authentication
Add proper hydration state handling to prevent logout on page reload

description: Fix authentication state persistence issue causing logout on page reload
context: Updated AuthGuard to properly wait for Zustand hydration before checking authentication state. The component now uses isHydrated state to ensure the persisted authentication data is loaded from localStorage before making routing decisions. This prevents the logout-on-reload issue.
